Articles.Content:
I need to get a list of active vessels and crew. I managed to figure out how to get all the active below but I'm having trouble figuring out how to get the vessels.

Using this API: https://anatid.github.io/XML-Documentation-for-the-KSP-API/annotated.html


      IEnumerator Kerbals = HighLogic.CurrentGame.CrewRoster.Crew.GetEnumerator();


      while(Kerbals.MoveNext()) {
        ProtoCrewMember Kerbal = (ProtoCrewMember)Kerbals.Current;
        if (Kerbal.rosterStatus == "Assigned") {
          // do stuff
        }
      }
I thing you're looking for <List> FlightGlobals.Vessels
